EmailTemplate.subject: [Turbonomic Customer Survey] Public Cloud Adoption and Challenges
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
The product management team at Turbo is conducting a short survey on cloud adoption and your input is appreciated. The survey has 9 questions and should take less than 5 minutes to complete.
Your feedback will help us understand how you're adopting cloud services, what it means to you and where we can help. If you're interested in giving feedback on our cloud roadmap or learning more about any of our plans there's an option within to let us know and we'll be in touch.
Click Here to Access the Survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/RZJ633R]]>
Thank you in advance for your time.
Alan Santos Product Management alan.santos@turbonomic.com
